text: Inferno is a 1953 American romantic crime drama movie. It was directed by Roy Ward Baker. The movie stars Robert Ryan, Rhonda Fleming, William Lundigan, Larry Keating and Henry Hull. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was remade in 1973 as Ordeal. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 romantic drama movies Category:1953 crime drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Ward Baker Category:Movies set in deserts Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American movie remakes
title: Inferno (1953 movie)
